name: Game's Simulator's Simulator^N
description:
Goat Simulator, Farming Simulator, Truck Simulator, Orgasm Simulator...

Simulator games are everywhere, so what about a Game's Simulator? Or even better: a Simulator of a simulator of ... (n times)... of a game !!!

Welcolme to Game's Simulator's Simulator ^N !

Key binding:

- Directional Arrow = Blue Arrows, move the Blue Cursor N+1

- ENTER = Green Button, press the Green Cursor N+1

- SPACE = Blue Button, press the Blue Cursor N+1

Good luck :)
